name: app/Board.js
SELECTION_BOX_START_THRESHOLD
description:
Minimal height/width value for selection box to be appear.
The selection box will not appear unless its height and width
are greater that this number.

name: Board
description:
The workspace board object where all components are placed and
interact with each other.

name: constructor
description: Constructor of the {@link Board} class.

name: addControl
description: Add the control to be controlled by current Board.

name: startConnection
description: Start connection activity from {@link ConnectionPin} object.

name: startFinishConnection
description:
Decide automatically to start or finalize the connection
activity depending on situation.
In case of startConnection was called previously the connection
will be finalized.

name: finishConnection
description:
Finalize the connection activity. The connection will be
established with previously started connection pin and
two pins will communicate.

name: createConnection
description: Create new connection and add it to the list.

name: translateConnections
description:
Translate the start and end points of all connections visually,
depending on pins they connect to.
This method is fired on drag-drop of the control.

params.name: pin
params.description: the pin that are being moved

name: unselect
description: Un-select all selected elements on {@link Board}.

name: deleteConnectionLines
description: Delete the connection lines given in elements array.

name: deleteControls
description: Delete elements from the Board contained in elements.

params.name: elements
params.description: the list of components to be deleted.

name: deleteSelected
description: Delete selected elements on the {@link Board}

name: onMouseDown
description: Is called when onMouseDown event occur on {@link Board}.

name: onMouseUp
description: Is called when onMouseUp event occur on {@link Board}.

name: onMouseMove
description: Is called when onMouseMove event occur on {@link Board}.

name: SelectionBox
description:
Selection rectangle used to select the objects
within specified area.

unknown.tagValue:
{{x1: number, y1: number,
           x2: number, y2: number}|*}

types:
{x1: number, y1: number,
           x2: number, y2: number}|*

name: app/controls/BaseControl.js
BaseControl
description:
BaseControl is the super-class of all logic controls.
The BaseControl class provides basic functionality that all
controls should have:
- drag-drop
- focus
- manage the input/output pins

All classes that extends BaseControl should override the initControl()
method.

name: draw
description:
This method needs to be overridden in subclass.
It is aim is to draw the component.

name: initControl
description: This method needs to be overridden in subclass.

name: onSelect
description: An event fired when element is selected.

name: select
description: Select control

name: onDragStart
description:
Fired on dragging start.
Basically it is almost same as mouse-down.

name: onDrag
description: Fired while dragging.

name: changeGradient
description:
Due to bug in raphael gradient is lost after transformations.
We do some workaround to bypass the issue.

name: setShapes
description: Set the shapes to be drawn to represent the current control visually.

name: addInputPins
description: Add input pin objects into this control.

params.name: pins
params.description: list of input pin objects as arguments.

name: addOutputPins
description: Add output pin objects into this control.

params.name: pins
params.description: list of output pin objects as arguments.

name: app/controls/ConnectionLine.js
draw
description: Draw the connection line.

name: init
description:
Initialization of the components.
The method should not be called externally.

name: unselect
description: Deselect the element.

name: onPinTranslate
description: The method is used to translate the pin locations during drag-drop.

name: setState
description:
Set binary state(LOW/HIGH) for the connection line.
This method should not be called externally.

name: app/controls/ConnectionPin.js
constructor
description: Constructor of {@link ConnectionPin}

params.name: parent
params.description: the parent control that the pin is used for

name: getType
description: Return the type of the current pin.

name: isInputType
description: Check if the current pin is INPUT type.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} true if it is input pin

return.description: true if it is input pin

name: isOutputType
description: Check if the current pin is OUTPUT type

name: canConnect
description: Check if the pin represented in argument can be connected with this pin.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} true if they can be connected

params.name: pin
params.description: pin object to check whether they can be connected.

return.description: true if they can be connected

name: getParent
description: The the parent control of this pin that belongs to.

unknown.tagValue: {BaseControl} the component the pin belongs to

return.description: the component the pin belongs to

name: translate
description: Used to translate the element during drag-drop.

name: setCanConnect
description: This sets the flag to mark it connectible or not.

name: notifyStateChange
description: Used to externally trigger the state change.

name: addStateChangeListener
description: Listener is used for input/output pins and triggered when the state is changed.

name: onActionDown
description: Event for input-pin down action.

name: onActionUp
description: Event for input-up action.

name: onHoverIn
description: Event for hover-in action.

name: onHoverOut
description: Event for hover-out action.
